Name: The Tavern of Magic
About the game: Welcome to the Tavern! The Tavern of Magic is Multiplayer-oriented CCG/Dungeon Crawler for VR. Bring your friend and fight in Duels or crawl thru Dungeon together! This game is currently in Early Access, but we are updating and bringing new content constantly! When this Game will leave Early Access you will be able to: Collect, buy or sell Magic Cards, form your perfect deck and conquer other mages in Duels. Crawl together thru Dungeons, defeat various enemies, seize their souls into your Card deck and use them in Battles. PvP Duels, 2v2, the Tavern Brawl PvE Dungeons (4 co-op or 4v4 'Mirrored Dungeon')
